author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GIL HOLDING STEADY BUT MOVING OVER COOLER WATERS...
summary: ...GIL HOLDING STEADY BUT MOVING OVER COOLER WATERS... As of 11:00 PM HST Fri Aug 01 the center of Gil was located near 17.4, -126.8 with movement WNW at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 991 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GIL HOLDING STEADY BUT MOVING OVER COOLER WATERS... As of 11:00 PM HST Fri Aug 01 the center of Gil was located near 17.4, -126.8 with movement WNW at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 991 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Gil (EP2/EP072025)
